data.title: Darlington Borough Council
data.meta_description: Contact details for Darlington Borough Council - Housing Department
data.text:
Contact details

Darlington Borough Council - Housing Department

Town Hall

Feethams

Darlington

County Durham

DL1 5QT

Public phone: 01325 405333

Email: housingoptions@darlington.gov.uk

Website URL: http://www.darlington.gov.uk

General information

Service offered: Assessment of entitlement to housing for people who are homeless, threatened with homelessness. Provision of housing for people considered in priority need of housing. Temporary accommodation may be available while eligibility enquiries made. General housing advice and information for private and council tenants and homeless people. Out of hours emergencies phone 01642 524552. Referrals and sign posting for support services

Target group: General public, including people who are or may be priority homeless

Area served: Darlington Borough Council area.

How to contact: Phone (01325 405333), email or website. Open Mon-Thurs 8:30am - 4:45pm + Fri 8:30am - 4:15pm

Availability

Monday: 8:30am - 4:45pm

Tuesday: 8:30am - 4:45pm

Wednesday: 8:30am - 4:45pm

Thursday: 8:30am - 4:45pm

Friday: 8:30am - 4:15pm

Weekends:

Office Hours:

Accessibility

Wheelchair access: Yes - full

Accessible toilets: -

Access notes: Parking for disabled drivers. Ramped entrance. Ground floor premises. Loop System

Other information

Languages other than English: Access to interpreters and Big Word Translation Service

Charity number:

Year established: 0

Staffing:

Public transport: Train station - 10 minutes walk. Bus station - 5 minutes walk.

Record last checked: 03 July 2023
